pages.text: $(item)Naked Nostrils$() are Meat Food item that dropped by $(thing)Hoglin$() upon death.$(br2)$(item)Raw Naked Nostrils$() are needed to craft the $(item)Milkmade Hat$(), when combined with $(item)Bamboo$() and a $(thing)dairy$() product inside of a $(pot)Ultimate Crock Pot$().
$(item)Charred Nostrils$() are Food items obtained by cooking $(item)Naked Nostrils$().
